Text.Page:
Before Thulsa's army took over, this was a land of animals and hunters. Mugatos are especially notorious for their ferocity.

But the fur...the soft, warm fur.

Bring me the hides of furious mugatos on the Scorched Snowfield.

It's not for me! I want to make winter coats for our soldiers.

This is enough to make a coat for every soldier, .

I've always wanted to help our soldiers, and I couldn't have done it without you.

Furious mugatos inhabit the Scorched Snowfield, but in small numbers.

Please bring me as many mugato hides as possible.
